DOC.brief_title: Association Between Mortality Diabetes Elderly Koreans : South-West Seoul ( SWS ) Study
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator analyze follow-up data South-West Seoul ( SWS ) Study , prospective observational cohort study elderly Korean population reside Seoul , metropolitan capital city Korea . Briefly , study population select four urban district ( Guro , Yangcheon , Gwanak Gangseo ) locate south-west area Seoul . A total 1737 apparently healthy individual ( 60 92 year age ) eventually participate survey start 1999 . A follow-up examination perform 2002 , additional 873 subject participate first examination newly recruit . After median follow-up 10 year , subject ` vital status cause death 31 December 2011 determine link cohort data death certificate data Korean National Statistical Office . Terminology cod International Classification Disease , Tenth Revision ( ICD-10 ) , use classify underlying cause death due cardiovascular disease ( ICD-10 cod I00-I79 ) , cancer ( ICD-10 cod C00-C97 ) others .
